casebody.data:
ORLANDO RESIDENCE, LTD.
v.
ALLIANCE HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT, LLC, et al. 113A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2019 Kenneth E. Nelson, for Nelson, Kenneth E. Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, J. Gray Wilson, Attorney at Law, for Alliance Hospitality Management, LLC, et al. F. James Warmoth, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Orlando Residence, LTD.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of May 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of May 2019."
